mapper.sql: id, url, frequency, timeout, overtimes, alarmInterval, requestMethod, matchMethod, matchContent, returnCode, alarmMethod, alarmTime, createTime, updateTime, status, survival,postParameter
mapper.insert: insert into gm_url_param (id, url, frequency, timeout, overtimes, alarmInterval, requestMethod, matchMethod, matchContent, returnCode, alarmMethod, createTime, updateTime, status, survival,postParameter) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{overtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{interval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{survival,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{postParameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into gm_url_param ( url, frequency, timeout, overtimes, alarmInterval, requestMethod, matchMethod, matchContent, returnCode, alarmMethod, createTime, updateTime, status, survival,postParameter) values
( #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.timeout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.overtimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.interval,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.requestMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.matchMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.matchContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.returnCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.alarmMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.survival,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.postParameter,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select count(*) from gm_url_param where url = #{url}
